effect.shortEffect: Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.
effect.full: When this Pokémon enters battle, it copies a random opponent's ability. This ability cannot copy flower gift, forecast, illusion, imposter, multitype, trace, wonder guard, or zen mode.

description.diamond-pearl: The Pokémon copies the foe’s ability.
description.platinum: The Pokémon copies the foe’s ability.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: The Pokémon copies the foe’s ability.
description.black-white: The Pokémon copies a foe’s Ability.
description.black-2-white-2: The Pokémon copies a foe’s Ability.
description.x-y: The Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
description.sun-moon: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
description.sword-shield: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
